meanings.definition: A looped cross symbol used in ancient Egypt.
meanings.sent1: In the museum, you can see many ankhs on display.
meanings.sent2: The ankhs were believed to bring eternal life to the Pharaohs.
meanings.sent3: The ankhs in the hieroglyphics seemed to wink at the curious visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace with ankhs symbolized her connection to the ancient gods.
meanings.sent5: The ankhs carved on the temple walls glowed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'ankh'.
meanings.sent1: She bought a set of ankhs to give as gifts to her friends.
meanings.sent2: The ankhs were beautifully crafted and adorned with precious gems.
meanings.sent3: The ankhs on the shelf clinked together as she rearranged them.
meanings.sent4: The ankhs on the altar seemed to whisper ancient secrets to the priest.
meanings.sent5: The ankhs in the market were selling quickly due to their popularity.
